title: Adarittu aruLvAi ennai
sahitya:
Adarittu aruLvAi ennai Arumukha nAthanE nI


anupallavi

  mEdini mIdinil vanda shOdanaiyAl nondu nAn vEdanaiyil vADinadum pOdum enrunnai nADinadum


caraNam    pAdam unadE gatiyena paNiya nAn varumpOdu EdumE tayakkamillAdu EzhaiyEnai kai viDAdu
tIdu Edum menmEl toDarAdu pAdukAttu pAda prasAdam Indu pEdaiyEn uyyumAru
